title: Kissing Another Grimaldi
description: Book 1 of Kissing the Bovaghnian Rogues Series.I will never leave you alone.One of the handsome Grimaldi twins falls into a car crash and dies the night he is to propose for marriage, leaving Kelsey Fontez pregnant with his son. Six years later, she turns up at the Grimaldi mansion’s door to introduce her son to his grandparents. The plan is she brings her son to the life he deserves and lives with him in peace.Scott Grimaldi, the rogue and vigorous half of the Grimaldi twins, isn’t going to let it happen. He has sedated his desires for too long already, masking his intentions with his endless needs to taunt her as a teenage girl. How far is he willing to taunt Kelsey now just to have her in his bed when it means losing to his father’s ultimatum of his inheritance, caring for his brother’s son, and throwing away his life-long dreams?
author: K.Z. Riman
